description: Verify user login with valid credentials
stepsToReproduce:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click login button
expectedResult: User should be successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard

description: Verify user login with invalid password
stepsToReproduce:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter invalid password
4. Click login button

1. Click 'Forgot Password' link
2. Enter valid email
3. Click submit
4. Check email for reset link
expectedResult: Password reset email should be sent successfully

description: Verify user registration with valid data
stepsToReproduce:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Fill all required fields
3. Accept terms and conditions
4. Click register
expectedResult: User account should be created successfully

stepsToReproduce:
1. Login to account
2. Go to profile settings
3. Click upload picture
4. Select valid image file
expectedResult: Profile picture should be uploaded and displayed

description: Verify search functionality with valid keywords
stepsToReproduce:
1. Navigate to search page
2. Enter valid search term
3. Click search button
4. Review results
expectedResult: Relevant search results should be displayed

description: Verify shopping cart add item functionality
stepsToReproduce:
1. Browse product catalog
2. Select a product
3. Click 'Add to Cart'
4. Verify cart contents
expectedResult: Product should be added to cart with correct details

description: Verify checkout process with credit card
stepsToReproduce:
1. Add items to cart
2. Proceed to checkout
3. Enter shipping info
4. Enter payment details
5. Complete order

description: Verify email notification for order confirmation
stepsToReproduce:
1. Complete an order
2. Check email inbox
3. Verify order confirmation email
expectedResult: Order confirmation email should be received

description: Verify mobile responsive design on tablet
stepsToReproduce:
1. Open website on tablet
2. Navigate through pages
3. Test form interactions
4. Verify layout
expectedResult: Website should display properly on tablet
